featured.text: Both 36 know their own drawbacks and limitations very well; therefore, they jointly decide to have one last race—not to decide who the winner or loser is, but just for their own pleasure and satisfaction.
We have followed your high-school career with joy and pleasure and know that your four years at college will be even more rewarding.

definition.zh_def: 愉快的感覺或享受的狀態。
definition.en_def: A feeling of enjoyment or satisfaction.
definition.example: She felt a great sense of pleasure while reading her favorite book.
